name: Wish -tale of the sixteenth night of lunar month-
description: An Eastern approach to storytelling, a visual novel with strong battle, human, and supernatural elements to create a compelling and original story straight from the doujin community of Japan!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2 or Higher Processor: 2Ghz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9+ Compatible Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated or Better
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core SSE2
